scripts.cy:ci: start-server-and-test 'RAILS_ENV=test rails db:prepare && RAILS_ENV=test SEED_SUPER_ADMIN_EMAIL=admin@empanada.dev SEED_SUPER_ADMIN_PASSWORD=password123 rails db:seed:replant && PORT=3100 rails server -e test -p 3100' http://localhost:3100/up 'CYPRESS_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3100 cypress run'
